MetaData.MetaDataItem: -Long press Switch_Button at least 10 seconds in the product. - Device Reset Locally notification is Transmitted. -use the reset procedure only when the primary controller is missing or inoperable.

This smart plug adopts flame retardant housing shell and Z-Wave wireless communication protocol. It has timing function and can be used to turn the plug switch on and off remotely by your mobile phone.
- Click [Remove] icon in Z-Wave Controller. - Press the Switch_Button 3 times within 1.5s - If remove Process is successful, Green LED is Blinking 6 times, then turn off.
- Click [Add] icon in Z-Wave Controller. - Press the Switch_Button 3 times within 1.5s, Green LED is Blinking 3 times within 1 second. - If add Process is successful, Green LED will turn off.

ChangeLog.Entry: Initial Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/1941/xml
